name: August of August
description:
Puzzle adventure games.Operation keyboard:Esc:menu,Shift:accelerate,space or Enter:survey,direction key control movement.
An alien spaceship crashes on a frozen planet one day,opening the dramatic story.
General small flat RPG screen, walking around, investigating clues and driving the plot.
Hopefully this relaxing game will give you a little sense of wonder as you enter the story.Whether August is over or not.
Multi-ending narrative,waiting for you to explore!
It's a tedious scavenger hunt.
